title: aoa3一直加载进不去
author: Y武林萌主Y
txt_content:
hmcl进入游戏还没进入界面就是这样
AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed
这一行是Minecraft进程退出时，OpenAL仍有设备处于运行状态，故出现这个提示。现在建议发一下fml-client-latest.log或者debug.log，以便找出导致崩溃或无响应的异常来源。

replies.author: TheRayChick_EN
replies.txt_content: 你发个日志我们再看看啊
